item.description:
ISN invites you to an exclusive BEACH- themed PARTY!

Summer. Bright colors. Flora. And the BEACH!

Join us in welcoming the Summer with a Bang!

Take out those floral prints and those hot pinks. Enjoy cool Salsa lessons and/or Learn "How to make a Sex on the Beach" (and of course, drink it away with glory!)

Friday- May 25th, 2012
Doors open at 9:00 pm
Salsa Lessons 9:15 pm
Mixology featuring how to make a "Sex on the Beach" 10:15 pm
We dance until 2 am!

Venue: Mojitos Boston 48 Winter Street Boston, MA 02108

Please purchase tickets here:Â http://isnbeachparty2012.eventbrite.com

Join ISN- Boston: www.facebook.com/ISN.Boston

ISN: International Students' Network- Boston
Exclusively for chic internationals
item.name: BEACH PARTY by ISN- Boston!
